body:
Use this form to send an application to become a property and financial affairs deputy.

You can only use this form if you have:

* completed all the relevant application forms
* a Payment By Account (PBA) number to pay for the application

If you need to complete the application forms, read the guidance on [applying to be a deputy](https://www.gov.uk/become-deputy/apply-deputy).

If you don't have a PBA account, you'll need to [apply for one](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/form-fee-account-application-form-fee-account-customer-application-form).

You can also apply by post.

The application fee is Â£365.
